participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Ambitious and passionate about music, often reflecting on personal experiences.
participant_1.background: i started playing guitar when i was three. i grew up in the industry. we spent summers ringing at national parks. i'm a country music singer.

participant_2.name: Lena
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and lively, with a zest for life and a love for trying new things.
participant_2.background: i love rollercoasters and sky diving. i'm a vegan and i love hummus. hello i just moved here from germany. i do like watching cooking shows.

content.text: Hey! Are you a country music singer? Because I am.
